(I normally am against stomping, but...)

Mobster raised his foot.

Mobster=
 (Kracken voice): Over!

Mobster brung his foot down towards Razorclaw...
 =
 ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: CYBERWOLF4 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com=
 
  Sent: Sunday, December 24, 2000 12:11 PM
  Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice=



  Razor Claw remained still as a statue, watching the battle rage around=
 him. He opened a comm to anyone listening. "Razor Claw to any available ma=
ximal, I'm pinned down and need some coverfire."
    ----- Original Message=
 ----- 
    From: SOULSTICE 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Saturday=
, December 23, 2000 1:16 PM
    Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


    Mobster =
stood still. The raptor would have to move sometime.

    Mobster (Horn Dri=
ll voice): He'll have to move sometime. Who helped to build this house?

  =
  Mobster kept his cannon aimed at Razorclaw, waiting and watching...
     =
 ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: CYBERWOLF4 
      To: nbwrpg@egr=
oups.com 
      Sent: Saturday, December 23, 2000 12:48 PM
      Subject: R=
e: Sorry soulstice


      Razor Claw knew that there was only one way to s=
urvive a blast from a weapon of that size. he transformed to Raptor mode an=
d used full strength on his shield. The ground around him incinerated on co=
ntact. He survived but it was sapping to much of his strength. The raptor c=
ouldn't move without deactivating his shield.
        ----- Original Messag=
e ----- 
        From: SOULSTICE 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        S=
ent: Friday, December 22, 2000 10:04 AM
        Subject: Re: Sorry soulstic=
e


        Mobster took a scratch of damage, still looking down at Razorcl=
aw. Mobster aimed his giant cannon at Razorclaw and fired...
          ----=
- Original Message ----- 
          From: CYBERWOLF4 
          To: nbwrpg@=
egroups.com 
          Sent: Friday, December 22, 2000 7:01 AM
          Su=
bject: Re: Sorry soulstice


          Razor Claw stood confused for the mo=
ment, he tried to show no weakness. He stepped forward and hurled his sword=
 at Mobster. "Is this supposed to impress me?" he asked looking up at the b=
ot he challenged. 
            ----- Original Message ----- 
            Fr=
om: SOULSTICE 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Thursd=
ay, December 21, 2000 10:50 AM
            Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


 =
           Gigas didn't move an inch, seeing as how Mobster was in his plac=
e now.

            Gigas: How about this, I crush you, as Mobster, I crush=
 you, as Gigas, it'll work 2 ways.

            Mobster switches voices.

 =
           Kracken: But right now, we're Mobster...
              ----- Ori=
ginal Message ----- 
              From: CYBERWOLF4 
              To: nbwr=
pg@egroups.com 
              Sent: Thursday, December 21, 2000 10:15 AM
  =
            Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


              Razor Claw looked =
up at his attacker still showing no fear, "That sounds like a challenge, Le=
t's make this interesting, you knock me down, I join your alliance, I knock=
 you down, you surrender to the Maximals, deal?" he stepped forward, pulled=
 his left arm back and threw an upprcut into Gigas' stomach. "I'll go first=
."
                ----- Original Message ----- 
                From: SOUL=
STICE 
                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                Sent: Wednes=
day, December 20, 2000 12:18 PM
                Subject: Re: Sorry soulstic=
e


                Gigas: Oh, hohohohoho, I love an unfair fight. That was=
n't my best shot, but I didn't want to waste anything on you. In other word=
s, I am not intimidated. I have seen battles come and go, me taking the bru=
nt of the attack, but i still stand, I still walk, I still fight. You know,=
 you should join the Alliance, it would do you a world of good.

          =
      Gigas stayed planted to his spot, not moving an inch...
             =
     ----- Original Message ----- 
                  From: CYBERWOLF4 
    =
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                  Sent: Wednesday, De=
cember 20, 2000 10:20 AM
                  Subject: Sorry soulstice


     =
             Sorry, it must've been mixxed up in the battle. I found it.

 =
                 claw struck him, but Gigas didn't move. Beholder 2 and Gre=
nade are both bowled over by the energy ball. Horn Drill jumps in the air a=
nd backflips, happy that he again came through for the Mini-Mafia. Gigas lo=
oks down at Razorclaw. (Judging by the size of the Razorclaw figure and the=
 fact that Gigas is a large, Ultra sized bot, like Depth Charge) Gigas swin=
gs a huge punch at Razorclaw

                  Razor Claws head snapped ba=
ck from Gigas' punch.  The punch hurt like hell but Razor Claw wouldn't sho=
w pain. The impact caused the Raptor to be knocked back about ten feet but =
he stayed on his feat. He looked back  at the attacker and couldn't hold ba=
ck a snarl. "I hope that wasn't your best shot, I'd hate to have to elimina=
te you in an unfair fight".
                    ----- Original Message ----=
- 
                    From: THECODE 
                    To: nbwrpg@egroup=
s.com 
                    Sent: Tuesday, December 19, 2000 6:13 PM
       =
             Subject: Re: three on one hardly seems fair, maybe the three s=
hould get help.


                    OOC: Hey, Gigas punched at Razorclaw,=
 post damage...
                      ----- Original Message ----- 
       =
               From: CYBERWOLF4 
                      To: nbwrpg@egroups.c=
om 
                      Sent: Tuesday, December 19, 2000 10:31 AM
       =
               Subject: three on one hardly seems fair, maybe the three sho=
uld get help.


                      Razor Claw saw the three bots leaving=
 the sceen of the battle and mistook them for escaping alliance members. he=
 mentally reported his actions to Ice and got the go ahead. He chased the t=
hree until they were out of the way of the fight. He transformed to robot m=
ode, pulled his sword and confronted them. "You will stop or you will be fo=
rced to, your choice."

                      He aproached the three bots r=
eady for battle and hoping that things won't be ended peacefully.
         =
               ----- Original Message ----- 
                        From: =
dachande 
                        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                 =
       Sent: Monday, December 18, 2000 7:40 PM
                        Subj=
ect: Eclipse, Wolveritron, and Ramus


                        ::Eclipse/Wo=
lveritron/Ramus::
                         
                            The=
y had heard the battling and decided to run away, they needed no part in th=
e conflict. Eclipse and Wolveritron ran into Ramus as they were leaving, an=
d togther they exited the base, in beast modes. And headed far away.






=











          eGroups Sponsor
